meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of sedges.
meanings.sent1: The sedgy field was filled with tall grasses.
meanings.sent2: The pond had a sedgy shoreline.
meanings.sent3: The sedgy path made the walk feel like an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, tousled and sedgy, flowed in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The sedgy landscape painted a picture of tranquility.

meanings.sent1: The sedgy texture of the fabric reminded her of nature.
meanings.sent2: His voice had a sedgy quality that soothed her.
meanings.sent3: The sedgy pattern on the wallpaper added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent4: Her dress, with its sedgy design, stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The sedgy aroma of the candle brought back memories of the countryside.
